get_UCR_data[source]

get_UCR_data(dsid, path='.', parent_dir='data/UCR', verbose=False, drop_na=False, on_disk=True, return_split=True)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dsid = 'NATOPS' 
X_train, y_train, X_valid, y_valid = get_UCR_data(dsid)
X, y, splits = get_UCR_data(dsid, return_split=False)
test_eq(X[splits[0]], X_train)
test_eq(y[splits[1]], y_valid)
test_eq(X[splits[0]], X_train)
test_eq(y[splits[1]], y_valid)
test_type(X, X_train)
test_type(y, y_train)
